posts.message:
[align=center][img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/vyres-gray.png[/img]

[b][size=xx-large][color=#ffffff][u]Hack Forum News - Edition 16[/u][/color][/size][/b]

[b]Welcome back to the Hack Forum News. Where we keep you up to date on the weekly events and news happening on site and around the world. If you have never heard of the Hack Forum News, don't worry, we have you covered. We are a team of members from the Hack Forums community who are journalists and writers, and we are here to keep you in the loop of the changes around the site and the events happening around the world.

This week we are bringing in a few new things. To start,  we have done a little work making the images for our header images a bit nicer & also bought in a new section with more to come shortly. Let us know what you think below.[/b]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/headlines-red.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6308363][color=#ffffff]Octoberfest Energy[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]

Octoberfest is just around the corner and [mention=1] is looking to see how many people are interested in it this year. A lot of people have shared that it's their favorite time of year for the site due to the award and the amount of fun it can be. If you haven't already, go and share your thoughts about Hack Forums Octoberfest. We know we can not wait.

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6309084][color=#ffffff]Octoberfest Award[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=1]

This week [mention=1] has been playing with a few ideas around the new award for everyone for Octoberfest. @Omniscient has given a few examples of what he has been trying out and wants some input from members of the site. We have given him a few versions this week to help as well as a few other members. If you have a good nack at making graphics, you could make the next award for Octoberfest. Go and show your talent!

[u][b][size=large][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6299866][color=#ffffff]Hack Forums News Team - Become a Writer[/color][/url][/size][/b][/u] By [mention=2331053]

Are you looking to join the HF news team? Do you enjoy making threads or even want to become a better writer? Well, we are looking for members of the site to help write each week and are looking for anyone who has any interest. We have a few new sections opening up right now, and we would love for you to see if they would be anything of interest to you. If you are interested, please check out the thread or contact [mention=2331053] to discuss joining the team behind the HF News.

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/statistics-magenta.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[img=800x400]https://i.gyazo.com/6ce57876b4b055806a5249fdbe42c04a.png[/img]

[b]Last Week:[/b]
[spoiler][img=800x400]https://i.gyazo.com/26b71c93a146b2b4f5c46ee785e8e607.png[/img][/spoiler]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/awards-yellow.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]
[color=#ffffff]

[b]This week we will see the start of Octoberfest which means the new award everyone will be able to be obtained. We cant wait to see the long list of awards given out in the next few weeks.

Sneak peak at the award -[/b] [award=231]
[b]

[mention=1140211] Has obtained the "Quickly Loved" award - [award=146]
[mention=941199] Has obtained the "King Decade" award - [award=194]
[mention=2335494] Has obtained the "King Decade" award - [award=194]
[mention=5697524] Has obtained the "Dicey" award - [award=97]
[/color][/b]

[hr]

[align=center][img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/notable.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=5655318]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6308836]Kindest Member on HF?[/url][/color][/size][/b][/u] - [b]by[/b] [mention=4402880] 

Only on HackForums could a thread about kindness turn into a full-blown debate. This wholesome discussion has already racked up 46+ replies as members nominate - and sometimes jokingly argue - over who deserves the title of HF's kindest soul. Another feel-good moment on the forum that reminds us how awesome the HF community really is.

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6309116]The 42-Cent Deal: Elon Musk Leases Grok AI to Entire US Government[/url][/color][/size][/b][/u] - [b]by[/b] [mention=5568595] 

This news sparked an interesting conversation: what if cutting-edge AI like Grok could be leased for just a few cents?
Turns out, if you're part of a U.S. government agency, that's not far from reality. Grok is reportedly being offered at just $0.42 per agency. The thread blends humor with real-world tech developments, making it one of this week's more thought-provoking reads.

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6308685]HF - Related Content & AI Curated Content[/url][/color][/size][/b][/u] - [b]by[/b] [mention=4931690]

A proposal to evolve HackForums into a smarter, AI-powered content network has revealed that something has already been quietly built. The idea? Use LLMs to generate summaries, link related threads and replies, surface timeless content, and boost discoverability across both forums and blogs. The proposal also includes AI-generated blog posts and contextual replies in active threads. In a promising response, @Omnicient@ confirmed he already has an LLM ready - now it's just a matter of figuring out how best to implement it. This could be a huge leap for HF’s long-term usability and visibility. Got thoughts? Join the discussion and help shape the future of HF!

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6308943]Ur favorite music to listen to when working[/url][/color][/size][/b][/u] - [b]by[/b] [mention=5595387] 

A thread popped up this week asking members what music they prefer while coding, grinding, or working in general. From lo-fi beats to total silence, HF members are sharing their routines and preferences for staying focused. It's a great way to discover something new or rethink your own workflow. Drop a reply and share your go-to work soundtrack!

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6309129]Fun with AI: The Weird Side of Machine Learning[/url][/color][/size][/b][/u] - [b]by[/b] [mention=5649157]

The weirdest and most wonderful side of AI was explored in a thread that highlights just how entertaining machine learning can be. From meme generators and deepfakes to cursed cat images and voice cloning, this post dives into the strange tools that show AI isn't just for productivity - it's also pure chaos. What's the weirdest AI-generated content you've come across? Jump in and share your favorite AI fails or creations.[/align]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/groups-yellow.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer - [/b][/size] [mention=3929084]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/music-header.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=3929084]

Recently we introduced a brand-new section to the HF News. This section will grow over time to more things, but for now we are just going to be doing Song of the week. We are open to what more we could bring to the section from your suggestions, but as a start, we feel adding the song of the week will be a great start for the section and lead the way forward for more things in the future.

Now we know some of you may question what the song of the week is all about, and we have thought of what a great answer. We feel like the song of the week should be a meaningful song that goes deeper than just general music and has meaning to it all. Granted, we may have a little fun with it sometimes. (Yes, we will have a Halloween version and Christmas version too.) But we want to keep it at a level where we have found the song has a true message behind it all and not just something that everyone will just see as another song that is just a bit catchy or got a good few beats to it. We hope this helps those with that question and if anyone has anything that they wish to ask, please feel free to add them below. We are more than happy to give the reason behind it.

This weeks Song Of The Week:
[YouTube]https://youtu.be/V0rMY9WgtKE?si=pgSEst2i4epnknCN[/youtube]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/contests.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=3929084]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6305248]
$100 USD (BTC) Contest || Celebrating My Acceptance in The Academy[/url] By [mention=4189082] [/color][/size][/b][/u]

A new contest has been created this week by @W1NK1LL3RX@. They have recently been accepted into The Academy, and they feel like it's time for them to share the love by making a massive $100 BTC giveaway to one lucky winner. Let's make sure to spread the love, and thank them for the contest. The contest ends September 30th, 2025. Make sure you get yourself entered before it's too late.

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6309077]Quantum Thread Contest #1 - Win BTC & HackForums Awards! - Recruitment[/Url] by [mention=2033319] [/color][/size][/b][/u]
[mention=2033319] is running his first giveaway since he started his new group. This is also a form or recruitment so those that want to gain access should get involved!
With the giveaway, you can secure yourself a spot within the group and also get some BTC, which if you have not noticed, BTC is still on the rise, and we can see it hitting big by the end of this year.

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/user-gray.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[b]
[size=large]Remember if you have reached an achievement on your account feel free to post about it on our weekly reports thread. That way we can add you to the news for the next edition. [u][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6299864]Click Here To See The Weekly Reports Thread[/url][/u][/size]
[/b]

[hr]

[img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/tech-brown.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer - [/b][/size] [mention=5465469]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Britain backs Jaguar Land Rover with £1.5B loan guarantee after cyber shutdown[/color][/size][/b][/u]  
Following a major cyberattack that halted JLR’s operations, the UK government has pledged a **£1.5 billion loan guarantee** to stabilise its supply chain and protect jobs.  
[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/britain-pledges-2-billion-loan-guarantee-jaguar-land-rover-2025-09-27/]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Jaguar Land Rover restores key systems after being hit by cyber incident[/color][/size][/b][/u]  
Some of JLR’s digital systems are now back online as part of a phased recovery plan, even while full operations still remain suspended.  
[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/business/retail-consumer/jaguar-land-rover-says-some-systems-back-online-following-cyber-attack-2025-09-25/]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Suppliers cut jobs & hours as JLR shutdown drags on[/color][/size][/b][/u]  
A survey shows that businesses in the West Midlands are now reducing staff hours or making redundancies as the ripple effects of JLR’s factory halt spread to suppliers.  
[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/business/world-at-work/jaguar-land-rover-shutdown-driving-suppliers-cut-jobs-reduce-hours-survey-2025-09-26/]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]UK police arrest suspect in ransomware attack on European airports[/color][/size][/b][/u]  
Authorities in the UK say they have detained a man in connection with the ransomware incident that disabled check-in and baggage systems across the major European airports.  
[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/uk-police-arrest-man-over-cyber-attack-that-affected-european-airports-2025-09-24/]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Collins Aerospace works to restore airline systems after intrusion[/color][/size][/b][/u]  
The parent company of the airline check-in software under attack. It says it is actively restoring impacted passenger processing systems disrupted by the cyber “intrusion.”  
[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/collins-aerospace-working-restoring-software-airlines-hit-by-cyber-attack-2025-09-24/]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]London nurseries’ data of 8,000 children leaked by ransomware actors[/color][/size][/b][/u]  
The group *Radiant* breached the Kido International, releasing personal details which included names, photos, addresses and family contacts of thousands of children in London nurseries.  
[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/london-nurseries-hit-by-hackers-data-8000-children-stolen-2025-09-26/]Source[/url][/b]


[/align]
posts.subject: Hack Forum News - Edition 16

posts.message:
[align=center][img]https://hackforums.net/images/hfnews/wor-magenta.png[/img]
[size=medium][b]Writer -[/b][/size] [mention=2331053]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]UN Security Council vote to delay return of sanctions on Iran[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Russia and China proposed a resolution to postpone the reimposition of UN sanctions on Iran by six months. A vote is expected but nothing is yet to take effect, though the resolution is unlikely to succeed given opposition from some permanent members.

[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/world/china/russia-china-ask-un-security-council-vote-delaying-return-iran-sanctions-2025-09-25]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Growing push for first female UN Secretary‑General[/color][/size][/b][/u]

At the 2025 U.N. General Assembly, leaders from various nations strongly advocated for a woman to lead the U.N. for the first time in its history, ahead of current Secretary General António Guterres’s term ending in 2026. We think this would be a great move, but sadly there are a lot of opposing votes around this due to the history of leaders being only men.

[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/calls-grow-first-female-un-chief-80-years-2025-09-26]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Violent shooting at U.S. ICE office & broaders[/color][/size][/b][/u]

A gunman attacked an ICE (Immigration and Customs Enforcement) office in Dallas, killing one individual, wounding two, and then taking his own life. Meanwhile, in U.S. politics, discussions are escalating over potential mass firings of federal workers if a government shutdown occurs.

[b][url=https://www.reuters.com/podcasts/ice-shooting-unga-argentina-us-tiktok-sale-2025-09-25]Source[/url][/b]

[u][b][size=large][color=#ffffff]Widespread strike in Italy over Gaza war[/color][/size][/b][/u]

Across Italy (and in some neighboring regions), a general strike protested Italy’s role in supplying arms to Israel amid the Gaza conflict. Hundreds of thousands took part, with demonstrations in over 75 municipalities.

[b][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/September_2025_Italian_general_strike_for_Gaza]Source[/url][/b]

[hr]
